meanings.sent1: The unburned wood was still fresh and untouched by fire.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter found an unburned area amidst the ashes.
meanings.sent3: The unburned marshmallows were the only ones left for s'mores.
meanings.sent4: The unburned memories of childhood lingered in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unburned forest stood tall and green, a stark contrast to the charred landscape around.

meanings.sent1: The unburned fuel tank was a safety concern for the mechanic.
meanings.sent2: The unburned gases remained inert in the laboratory.
meanings.sent3: The unburned candle refused to light no matter how many matches were used.
meanings.sent4: His unburned passion for music fueled his creativity.
meanings.sent5: The unburned paper crumpled easily, showing no signs of heat exposure.

meanings.definition: Not having been set on fire.
meanings.sent1: The unburned house stood unscathed amidst the flames.
meanings.sent2: The unburned fields provided a safe haven for the wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The unburned matches were useless for starting a campfire.
meanings.sent4: Her unburned determination kept her going despite the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unburned building material was a testament to its fire-resistant quality.
